Markup: header-slider/header-slider.twig 
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA-->
<div class="slider-area">
  <div class="pogoSlider">
    {% for item in items %}
    <div class="pogoSlider-slide" data-transition="fade" {% if loop.index == 1 %} data-duration="1500"{% endif %} style="background:url({{ item.image }}) no-repeat scroll 0 0 / cover;">
      <h2 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="700">{{ item.pre_title }}</h2>
      <h1 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="1500">{{ item.title|raw }}</h1>
      {% if item.cta %}
      	<h3 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="2300"><a href="{{ item.cta.url }}">{{ item.cta.text }}</a></h3>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
</div>
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA END-->
Source: header-slider/header-slider.scss, line 1
